page.title: 11Page 11 My Day- At Home
page.content: When I get home I change out of my school clothes. I have something to eat like sweets and a biscuit and go out to play. I like riding my bike or playing in the woods making camps or tracks for my bike. I sometimes play snooker or pool on my friend's snooker table. I like playing with Technic Lego. I usually have my dinner between 5 and 6o'clock. My dad is still at work. My favourite dinners are meat pie, new potatoes and carrots or sausages, chips and beans. I have an iced bun or fruit for my pudding. After dinner I play on the Recreation Ground for a while and come indoors at about 8.30pm. I usually have a bath before going to bed. I like to have a bag of crisps, a biscuit or a small salad for supper. I clean my teeth and go to bed between 9 and 10 pm.
